channel.title: Version 2.2 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 2.2.0 (2021-09-09) Enhancements [feature] sitemap: hide hidden pages from sitemap and SEO indexing #85 Fixes [bug] theme: fix showVisitedLinks in case Hugo is configured to modify relative URLs #86 Maintenance [task] theme: switch from data-vocabulary to schema #84
